ygData.subject: Off Topic, trolls and ogres
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, it isnt strange at all.  Ogres and Trolls are vicious races that barely get along with THEMSELVES, why should they get along with each other? If you
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, it isnt strange at all. Ogres and Trolls are vicious races that
barely get along with THEMSELVES, why should they get along with each other?
If you read the little blurb telling you about your race/class combination
when you create your character... you know, the one above the "this
race/class combination is of HIGH difficulty" line... then you would get a
small idea why. Case in point.... The Greenbloods (Ogre shadowknights and
shamans) absolutely HATE the Ogre Warrior caste (cant remember thier name
right now.) and are convinced that the warriors are inferior.

>Message: 3
> Date: Mon, 19 Jul 1999 12:22:59 -0400
> From: "Sturgill, Jim" <JimS@...>
>Subject: RE: Troll smithing
>
>Thanks! Isn't that strange? You would think evil races would get along.
> Bonzz
